content.question: Which of the following best describes the behavior of the code segment?

choices.label: It prints the product of all the elements in arr.
It prints the product of all the negative elements in arr.
It prints the product of all the positive elements in arr.
It prints nothing because of a run-time error.

content.answer: It prints the product of all the positive elements in arr.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
